## Source: amazon-inspector (8e0377e0cb41b793d9733d21ccf71ee44de194a8988cbbd874d88c3cb5e03cce)

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (15eaaabf4ae55354e48ba58adea564a37e6b713b6b288921e49d9edbcb12db69)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'wartsila-application-json' @ 1.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
